job_tasks.phrase: manage the delivery of high-quality software products and features based on GenAI technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of overseeing the creation and deployment of software, which aligns with the definition of traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive the timely and successful delivery of software services, focusing on adaptability and solution-oriented approaches to meet dynamic project needs.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the management and execution of software delivery, emphasizing adaptability and problem-solving in a project context, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead the development and integration of GenAI components, demonstrating an ability to quickly assimilate new technologies and apply them effectively.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions leading the development and integration of components, which is a key aspect of software engineering, even when those components are GenAI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of services into our product ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services into a larger product, a fundamental software engineering task, and emphasizes collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Regularly review and enhance our service offerings, keeping pace with industry advancements and ensuring alignment with project requirements.
job_tasks.justification: Reviewing and enhancing services is part of the software development lifecycle, ensuring the product remains relevant and functional.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay informed about the latest GenAI technologies and approaches, assessing their relevance to enhance our services and your own professional growth.
job_tasks.justification: While this mentions staying informed about GenAI technologies, the core action is assessing relevance to enhance services, which leans towards the application and integration of these technologies rather than deep model development or data management.

soft_skills.phrase: solution-oriented approaches to meet dynamic project needs.
ability to quickly assimilate new technologies and apply them effectively.
Stay informed about the latest GenAI technologies and approaches, assessing their relevance to enhance our services and your own professional growth.
Drive the timely and successful delivery of software services

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes 'Lead Software Engineer' and focuses heavily on 'delivery of high-quality software products and features' and 'development and integration of GenAI components'. While GenAI technology is mentioned, the core responsibilities are rooted in software engineering practices (1.A.1). There are no explicit tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG (Macro-Category B). The role is about integrating GenAI into software, rather than specializing in the GenAI models themselves. The soft skills also lean towards adaptability and problem-solving within a software delivery context. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role being a 'Lead Software Engineer' with a focus on delivery and integration of GenAI components. The responsibilities are well-defined and clearly fall under software engineering tasks, with no deep specialization in AI model development. This clarity allows for a high-confidence assignment of the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.
